mapper.insert: insert into Resource (`code`, parentCode, `name`, url, sort, type, isShow, availableStatus, createTime) values (#{code}, #{parentCode}, #{name}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{isShow}, #{availableStatus}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update Resource
`name` = #{name},
url = #{url},
sort = #{sort},
type = #{type},
isShow = #{isShow},
availableStatus = #{availableStatus},
updateTime = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id, `code`, parentCode, `name`, sort, type, isShow from Resource
(`code` like concat(#{key},'%') or parentCode like concat(#{key},'%') or `name` like concat(#{key},'%')) and
type = #{type} and
isShow = #{isShow} and
availableStatus = #{availableStatus} and

select `code`, parentCode, `name`, url, type, sort from Resource
type in
#{item}
and
isShow = #{isShow} and
availableStatus = #{availableStatus} and
order by `sort` desc
